com.loyauty.dao.core
Interface DaoManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractDaoManager, DaoManagerImpl
public interface DaoManager

DAO manager interface. It provides a unique access point to all DAOs in the system as well as other methods needed to manipulate transactions.

Author:
Muthanna

Method Summary
 java.lang.Object executeAndHandle(DaoCommand command)
          All Database access operation should invoke this method for it is designed to handle acquiring connections to the DB, committing and rolling back transactions, handling exception, and cleaning up the transaction garbage.
 UserDao getUserDao()
          Returns user's DAO
 boolean isCommitTransaction()
          Indicates whether the transaction is set to be committed.
 void setCommitTransaction(boolean commitTransaction)
          Sets commit status to TRUE or FALSE.

executeAndHandle

java.lang.Object executeAndHandle(DaoCommand command)
                                  throws DaoException
All Database access operation should invoke this method for it is designed to handle acquiring connections to the DB, committing and rolling back transactions, handling exception, and cleaning up the transaction garbage.

Parameters:
command - the DAO command used
Returns:
an object representing the returned result or null
Throws:
DaoException
